titles.title: Touch the Hem of His Garment

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Touch the hem of His garment,
Let Jesus make you whole,
Touch the hem of His garment,
Let His healing virtue flow;
Lift your hands, you can reach Him,
If you'll only be so bold;
Touch the hem of His garment,
And He will make you whole.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
My friend, if it's been many years
That you've followed on behind,
Trying every other help
Except His touch divine,
But still your illness lingers on,
In body or in soul,
Touch the hem of His garment,
And He will make you whole.
